comments:
I tried deleting a project and received the following error dialog: "The command
for the key you pressed failed". This might be to be a progress issue, so I am
assigning to UI.

I am not able to reproduce this bug. I am using Build id: 200405280010. 

Here is the content of the log file:

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 63721 ***

Unfortunately, I am not able to reproduce this. All I know is that I tried
deleting a project (using the "DEL" key) and I had some files open.
